DataElement.preferredName: Patient Blood Culture Procedure Target Organism Positive Finding Total Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of occurrences related to an observation confirming the presence of a living thing, such as an animal, a plant, a bacterium, or a fungus in a laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms of the liquid tissue of a person receiving medical care.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Blood Culture Procedure Target Organism Positive Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to an observation confirming the presence of a living thing, such as an animal, a plant, a bacterium, or a fungus in a laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms of the liquid tissue of a person receiving medical care.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Blood Culture Procedure Target Organism Positive Finding
Property.preferredDefinition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.:Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.:The goal intended to be attained.:A living thing, such as an animal, a plant, a bacterium, or a fungus.:An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.
An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a numeric count of the total number of occurrences.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: How many positive cultures wi
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many positive cultures with a targeted organism did the patient have during the Study period?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
